definitions.example: It was a surprise to find out I owed twice as much as I thought I did.

definitions.definition: The feeling that something unexpected has happened.
definitions.example: Imagine my surprise on learning I owed twice as much as I thought I did.

definitions.definition: A dish covered with a crust of raised pastry, but with no other contents.
To cause (someone) to feel unusually alarmed or delighted by something unexpected.
definitions.example: It surprises me that I owe twice as much as I thought I did.

definitions.definition: To do something to (a person) that they are not expecting, as a surprise.
definitions.example: He doesn’t know that I’m in the country – I thought I’d turn up at his house and surprise him.

definitions.definition: To undergo or witness something unexpected.
